body: Build with Python 3.11

Thanks to @nwilbert:
- #87 Fix handling of level from pyproject.toml

Thanks to @ticdenis:
- #86 order package licenses alphabethically to make the report more idempotent

Thanks to @ticdenis:
- #85 support pyproject.toml for loading dependencies from [project.dependencies] and [project.optional-dependencies]

Thanks to @s4ke:
- #79 Fix \r issues on Windows

Thanks to @ssbarnea:
- #71 Enable liccheck to be used as a pre-commit hook

Thanks to @bagerard:
- #75 Ignore editable requirements when parsing the req file

Thanks to @joshfriend:
- #68: Build and distribute wheels
Fixes #67: added a `release` workflow to bump version in `setup.py` and create tag.

Thanks to @joshfriend:
- #66 Improved license detection from metadata
Build with Github actions

Thanks to @eganjs:
- #52 Make "./liccheck.ini" the default ini file
Fix failing build

Thanks to @ticdenis:
- #54 `__main__.py` file

Thanks to @atugushev:
- #51 Use tox

Thanks to @atugushev:
- #49 Fix tests

Thanks to @atugushev:
- #48 Add `--no-deps` option
Fix #34
Fix #40: support pip 20.1
Forgot to bump version to 0.4.1 in `setup.py`.

Thanks to @larsrinn:
- #32 Read strategy from pyproject toml

name: Support pip 20
body:
Thanks to @missimer:
- #37 Support pip 20

Note: pip 20 no longer works with Python 3.4.
- #30 fix installation (0.3.11 does not install if package `semantic_version` is not present)

Thanks to @shakhat:
- #28 fix setup.py to install all dependencies from requirements.txt
- #27 whitelist packages with version specifiers

Thanks to @Zougi:
- #25 allow package to be excluded without version

Thanks to @hnykda:
- #24 remove argparse as a dependency
#23 authorized packages: keep case of options in license strategy file
#22 Handle license missing from metadata

Thanks to @shakhat:
- #20 Avoid inifinite recursion on packages with cyclic dependencies
PR #19: add basic support for markers in requirements.txt and tweak liccheck's own requirements.txt.
PR #18: reorganize tests and prevent crashes when the strategy file does not contain all expected keys.
PR #17:  strip the useless "License" suffix.

- #15: support all versions of python.
- #16: add different levels of check
Readme: fix formatting and typos.
